game.l_dis:
Jetpack Joyride Unblocked - Play Online for Free

Experience the ultimate thrill with Jetpack Joyride, an action-packed endless running game that keeps you on the edge of your seat! Take control of Barry Steakfries and embark on a high-flying adventure, dodging obstacles, shooting enemies, and collecting coins to unlock exciting power-ups and stylish outfits.

What is Jetpack Joyride?

Jetpack Joyride is a popular endless runner game developed by Halfbrick Studios. Players control Barry Steakfries, who steals a jetpack and must escape from a high-tech laboratory filled with dangerous traps, missiles, and electric zappers. The game is simple to play but challenging to master, offering hours of addictive fun.

How to Play Jetpack Joyride?

The controls of Jetpack Joyride are simple yet engaging:

  • Hold down your finger, left mouse button, or space bar to ascend.
  • Release to descend.
  • Avoid obstacles such as missiles, lasers, and zappers.
  • Collect coins, power-ups, and upgrades to enhance your gameplay.
  • Ride crazy vehicles like the mechanical dragon and profit bird to maximize fun.
